<script>
var saveComic = (e) => {
	e.preventDefault();

	var target = e.target;
	if (target instanceof HTMLAnchorElement == false) {
		target = target.parentNode;
	}
	child = target.childNodes;
	if (child[0].classList.contains('save-icon')) {
		child[0].classList.remove('save-icon');
		child[0].classList.add('saved-icon');
	} else {
		child[0].classList.remove('saved-icon');
		child[0].classList.add('save-icon');
	}

	//get data attribute
	let comic_id = target.getAttribute('data-comic-id');
	let user_id  = '';
	let api_key  = '';


	if (user_id != '0' && comic_id) {

		var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
		xhttp.open("POST", "https://comicskingdom.com/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php", true);
		xhttp.setRequestHeader("Content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");

		xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
			if (this.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE && this.status == 200) {
				console.log("SENT");
			}
		};

		xhttp.send("user_id="+user_id+"&comic_id="+comic_id+"&token="+api_key+"&action=ck_save_comic");
	} else {
		//redirect to subs page
		window.location.href = "/subscribe/?plan=30_days";
	}
};

var faveFeature = (e) => {
	e.preventDefault();

	var target = e.target;
	if (target instanceof HTMLAnchorElement == false) {
		target = target.parentNode;
	}
	child = target.childNodes;
	if (child[0].classList.contains('fave-icon')) {
		child[0].classList.remove('fave-icon');
		child[0].classList.add('faved-icon');
	} else {
		child[0].classList.remove('faved-icon');
		child[0].classList.add('fave-icon');
	}


	//get data attribute
	let feature_id = target.getAttribute('data-feature-id');
	let user_id  = '';
	let api_key  = '';

	if (user_id != '0' && feature_id) {
		var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
		xhttp.open("POST", "https://comicskingdom.com/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php", true);
		xhttp.setRequestHeader("Content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");

		xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
			if (this.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE && this.status == 200) {
				console.log("SENT");
			}
		};

		xhttp.send("user_id="+user_id+"&feature_id="+feature_id+"&token="+api_key+"&action=ck_fave_feature");
	} else {
		//redirect to subs page
		window.location.href = "/subscribe/?plan=30_days";
	}
};

var saveIcons = document.getElementsByClassName("ajax-save-comic");
for (let i = 0; i < saveIcons.length; i++) {
	saveIcons[i].addEventListener('click', saveComic, false);
}

var faveIcons = document.getElementsByClassName("ajax-fave-feature");
for (let i = 0; i < faveIcons.length; i++) {
	faveIcons[i].addEventListener('click', faveFeature, false);
}
</script>

<script>
function ckGatingSetCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
  const d = new Date();
  d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
  let expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
  document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
}

function ckGatingGetCookie(cname) {
  let name = cname + "=";
  let decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
  let ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
  for(let i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
    let c = ca[i];
    while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
      c = c.substring(1);
    }
    if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
      return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
    }
  }
  return "";
}

function arrIndex(needle, haystack) {
    var found = 0;
    for (var i=0, len=haystack.length; i<len; i++) {
        if (haystack[i] == needle) return i;
        found++;
    }

    return -1;
}


const d = new Date();
let active_month = d.getMonth();

//comic ID
let ckid = '2681326';

let ckGating = localStorage.getItem("ckGating");

if (ckGating != null) {

	//unserialize to object
	ckGating = JSON.parse(ckGating);

	//reset each month change
	if (ckGating.active_month != active_month) {
		ckGating = {
			'active_month': active_month,
			'visits': 1,
			'visited': [ckid]
		};
	} else {

		//if views < limit, add to gating
		if (ckGating.visited.length <= 10) {
			//not visited, track view
			if(arrIndex(ckid, ckGating.visited) == -1) {
				ckGating.visited.push(ckid);
			}
			ckGating.visits = ckGating.visited.length;
		}
	}

} else {

	ckGating = {
		'active_month': active_month,
		'visits': 1,
		'visited': [ckid]
	};
}

//check cookie, if it's already at the limit, ignore and let it expire
let ck_gate = ckGatingGetCookie('ck_gate');
if (!ck_gate || ck_gate <= 10) {
	ckGatingSetCookie('ck_gate', ckGating.visited.length, 1);
}

//save data to local storage
localStorage.setItem('ckGating', JSON.stringify(ckGating));

</script>

<script>
var saveComic = (e) => {
	e.preventDefault();

	var target = e.target;
	if (target instanceof HTMLAnchorElement == false) {
		target = target.parentNode;
	}
	child = target.childNodes;
	if (child[0].classList.contains('save-icon')) {
		child[0].classList.remove('save-icon');
		child[0].classList.add('saved-icon');
	} else {
		child[0].classList.remove('saved-icon');
		child[0].classList.add('save-icon');
	}

	//get data attribute
	let comic_id = target.getAttribute('data-comic-id');
	let user_id  = '';
	let api_key  = '';


	if (user_id != '0' && comic_id) {

		var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
		xhttp.open("POST", "https://comicskingdom.com/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php", true);
		xhttp.setRequestHeader("Content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");

		xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
			if (this.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE && this.status == 200) {
				console.log("SENT");
			}
		};

		xhttp.send("user_id="+user_id+"&comic_id="+comic_id+"&token="+api_key+"&action=ck_save_comic");
	} else {
		//redirect to subs page
		window.location.href = "/subscribe/?plan=30_days";
	}
};

var faveFeature = (e) => {
	e.preventDefault();

	var target = e.target;
	if (target instanceof HTMLAnchorElement == false) {
		target = target.parentNode;
	}
	child = target.childNodes;
	if (child[0].classList.contains('fave-icon')) {
		child[0].classList.remove('fave-icon');
		child[0].classList.add('faved-icon');
	} else {
		child[0].classList.remove('faved-icon');
		child[0].classList.add('fave-icon');
	}


	//get data attribute
	let feature_id = target.getAttribute('data-feature-id');
	let user_id  = '';
	let api_key  = '';

	if (user_id != '0' && feature_id) {
		var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
		xhttp.open("POST", "https://comicskingdom.com/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php", true);
		xhttp.setRequestHeader("Content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");

		xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
			if (this.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE && this.status == 200) {
				console.log("SENT");
			}
		};

		xhttp.send("user_id="+user_id+"&feature_id="+feature_id+"&token="+api_key+"&action=ck_fave_feature");
	} else {
		//redirect to subs page
		window.location.href = "/subscribe/?plan=30_days";
	}
};

var saveIcons = document.getElementsByClassName("ajax-save-comic");
for (let i = 0; i < saveIcons.length; i++) {
	saveIcons[i].addEventListener('click', saveComic, false);
}

var faveIcons = document.getElementsByClassName("ajax-fave-feature");
for (let i = 0; i < faveIcons.length; i++) {
	faveIcons[i].addEventListener('click', faveFeature, false);
}
</script>

<script>
function ckGatingSetCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
  const d = new Date();
  d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
  let expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
  document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
}

function ckGatingGetCookie(cname) {
  let name = cname + "=";
  let decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
  let ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
  for(let i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
    let c = ca[i];
    while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
      c = c.substring(1);
    }
    if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
      return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
    }
  }
  return "";
}

function arrIndex(needle, haystack) {
    var found = 0;
    for (var i=0, len=haystack.length; i<len; i++) {
        if (haystack[i] == needle) return i;
        found++;
    }

    return -1;
}


const d = new Date();
let active_month = d.getMonth();

//comic ID
let ckid = '2681545';

let ckGating = localStorage.getItem("ckGating");

if (ckGating != null) {

	//unserialize to object
	ckGating = JSON.parse(ckGating);

	//reset each month change
	if (ckGating.active_month != active_month) {
		ckGating = {
			'active_month': active_month,
			'visits': 1,
			'visited': [ckid]
		};
	} else {

		//if views < limit, add to gating
		if (ckGating.visited.length <= 10) {
			//not visited, track view
			if(arrIndex(ckid, ckGating.visited) == -1) {
				ckGating.visited.push(ckid);
			}
			ckGating.visits = ckGating.visited.length;
		}
	}

} else {

	ckGating = {
		'active_month': active_month,
		'visits': 1,
		'visited': [ckid]
	};
}

//check cookie, if it's already at the limit, ignore and let it expire
let ck_gate = ckGatingGetCookie('ck_gate');
if (!ck_gate || ck_gate <= 10) {
	ckGatingSetCookie('ck_gate', ckGating.visited.length, 1);
}

//save data to local storage
localStorage.setItem('ckGating', JSON.stringify(ckGating));

</script>
